page.title: 18Gilmerton Shops.
page.content:
In {Gilmerton Village }there are quite a lot of shops.There is a{post office, {a fruit shop,a delicatessan,a butcher, {a Low's supermarket,a Pakistani's,a {cafe,a betting shop,a video shop, a {mini supermarket, a fishmongers and a {T.V.rental shop. }There is also a { {Chinese take-away,}and a {Royal Bank {of Scotland.} There is also {Jackson's,}the bakers which has home-made soup,milk,cakes, bread and biscuits.At one time there used to be a {laundrette.}Before the { {sports shop}there used to be another butcher. I think it's good that the Pakistani's stay open later than the other shops in case you run out of something.
APRIL JONES.1E.
